name: Snake the game (Gidsik)
description:
Snake the game - is my first finished game , i made it back in 2016 and now released it here :p

This is a simple game, only setting is speed: you can chose between 1(slowest) and 6(fastest).
Control as simple as a game: use arrows to move, enter to confirm and esc or 'P' to pause\unpause the game.
